import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../context/cart.context' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem }) => { const {remove} =useContext(CartContext); const { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } = cartItem return (
{name} {`{<}`} {quantity} {price}
remove(cartItem)}>✕
) } export default CheckoutItem
